I had a dream that kind of acted like a game.

Like I wasn't controlling myself in the dream I was LITERALLY someone else.

And he was a cool futuristic badass guy! (The whole dream took place in the future) and the guys weapon was a *GIANT BEAM SABER* that's supposed to be used as a weapon a Mech would carry but he took it off and trained himself to be able to use and carry it.

It was flipping cool!
